issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://apps.apple.com/us/app/eenadu-news-official-app/id1189922191](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Feenadu-news-official-app%2Fid1189922191) ### Comment > When adguard is enabled, mentioned app do not opens at all and gets struck in LOADING window only. When adguard is disabled then the mentioned app opens. Once app is opened i tried to enable adguard but the app still display ads. > Username: `@VijayChandK` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8sa8xh8v40kcowwocws4wskc08skk0k2djz6najkcu.jpg?nc=1)

issue.body:

- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;

issue.title: https://adukar.com/

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version 4.4.48 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://adukar.com/by/news/abiturientu/takzhe-slitno-ili-razdelno-obiyasnyam-raznitsu ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots Плашка на первом снимке появляется после 15 секунд.
Details

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ef7183e3-d077-41eb-ba86-7f860eec25cc) ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b4649083-8a0b-4cd5-b3ff-54d37941f748)

### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
